action.action-desc: Mr. Ratcliffe introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to establish within the Office of the Under Secretary for Health of the Department of Veterans Affairs the position of Chief Information Officer of the Veterans Health Administration, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Department of Veterans Affairs Information Technology Restructuring Act of 2017.

section.header: Establishment of position of Chief Information Officer of Veterans Health Administration

subsection.text: Section 7306(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraph (10) as paragraph (11); and
by inserting after paragraph (9) the following new paragraph (10):
The Chief Information Officer of the Veterans Health Administration, who shall—

subparagraph.text: serve in a full-time capacity at the Central Office of the Department; and

be responsible to, and report directly to, the Under Secretary for Health on all matters regarding the procurement, acquisition, and management of information technology systems and services for the Veterans Health Administration.

subsection.text: Not later than 30 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Veterans Affairs shall appoint an individual to serve as the Chief Information Officer of the Veterans Health Administration under section 7306(a)(10) of title 38, United States Code, as amended by subsection (a).
